body_html: Hmm I think it worked in your example since sys.argv[1:] is ['--myarg', 'buzz'], --myargv is treated as the program name, and it only tries to parse ['buzz'], which only contains positional arguments.
body_text: Hmm I think it worked in your example since sys.argv[1:] is ['--myarg', 'buzz'], --myargv is treated as the program name, and it only tries to parse ['buzz'], which only contains positional arguments.
body: Hmm I think it worked in your example since `sys.argv[1:]` is `['--myarg', 'buzz']`, `--myargv` is treated as the program name, and it only tries to parse `['buzz']`, which only contains positional arguments.
